trans-unit.source: Provides a managed implementation of the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 提供的進階加密標準 (AES) 的對稱演算法的 managed 的實作。

trans-unit.source: The AES algorithm is essentially the Rijndael symmetric algorithm with a fixed block size and iteration count.
trans-unit.target: AES 演算法是基本上 Rijndael 對稱演算法使用固定的區塊大小和反覆項目計數。

trans-unit.source: This class functions the same way as the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged> class but limits blocks to 128 bits and does not allow feedback modes.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別函式的相同方式<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged>類別但會限制為 128 位元區塊，並不允許回饋模式。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the Windows security policy setting for Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS)-compliant algorithms is enabled, using this algorithm throws a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果 Windows 安全性原則設定為美國聯邦資訊處理標準 (FIPS)-已啟用之標準演算法、 使用此演算法會擲回<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AesManaged"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AesManaged"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The Windows security policy setting for FIPS is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Windows 安全性原則設定的 FIPS 已啟用。

trans-unit.source: This implementation is not part of the Windows Platform FIPS-validated cryptographic algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 此實作不是 Windows Platform FIPS 驗證的密碼編譯演算法的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric decryptor object using the current key and initialization vector (IV).
trans-unit.target: 建立對稱解密子物件使用目前的金鑰和初始化向量 (IV)。

trans-unit.source: A symmetric decryptor object.
trans-unit.target: 對稱解密子物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric decryptor object using the specified key and initialization vector (IV).
trans-unit.target: 建立對稱解密子物件使用初始化向量 (IV) 與指定之索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The secret key to use for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用對稱演算法的祕密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The initialization vector to use for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 要使用對稱演算法的初始化向量。

trans-unit.source: A symmetric decryptor object.
trans-unit.target: 對稱解密子物件。

trans-unit.source: key or iv is .
trans-unit.target: keyor iv is .

trans-unit.source: key is invalid.
trans-unit.target: key不正確。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric encryptor object using the current key and initialization vector (IV).
trans-unit.target: 建立對稱加密子物件使用目前的金鑰和初始化向量 (IV)。

trans-unit.source: A symmetric encryptor object.
trans-unit.target: 對稱加密子物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric encryptor object using the specified key and initialization vector (IV).
trans-unit.target: 建立對稱加密子物件使用初始化向量 (IV) 與指定之索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The secret key to use for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用對稱演算法的祕密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The initialization vector to use for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 要使用對稱演算法的初始化向量。

trans-unit.source: A symmetric encryptor object.
trans-unit.target: 對稱加密子物件。

trans-unit.source: key or iv is .
trans-unit.target: keyor iv is .

trans-unit.source: key is invalid.
trans-unit.target: key不正確。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of bits to use as feedback.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要做為意見的位元數。

trans-unit.source: The maximum feedback size is 128 bits.
trans-unit.target: 回饋大小的上限為 128 位元。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because this algorithm does not support feedback modes, using this property is discouraged.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 因為這個演算法不支援回饋模式，不建議使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The feedback size, in bits.
trans-unit.target: 回饋大小，以位元。

trans-unit.source: Generates a random initialization vector (IV) to use for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 產生的隨機初始化向量 (IV) 來使用對稱演算法。

trans-unit.source: Generates a random key to use for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 產生使用對稱演算法的隨機金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initialization vector (IV) to use for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定初始化向量 (IV) 來使用對稱演算法。

trans-unit.source: The initialization vector to use for the symmetric algorithm
trans-unit.target: 要使用對稱演算法的初始化向量

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secret key used for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定對稱演算法使用之秘密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The key for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 對稱演算法的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the secret key used for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定大小，以位元對稱演算法所使用之祕密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size of the key is 256 bits.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的大小上限為 256 位元。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bits, of the key used by the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 位元的對稱演算法所使用的金鑰大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode for operation of the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定對稱演算法的作業模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode> modes are not supported.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode>不支援的模式。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the block cipher mode to use for encryption.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定要用於加密的區塊加密模式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Mode is set to <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Mode is set to <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding mode used in the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定對稱演算法中使用的填補模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the type of padding to apply.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定要套用的填補類型。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.PaddingMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.PaddingMode"> </xref>。
